src:
Weintraub: “Aparentemente houve um problema na telefonia local”

03 Nov 2019, 12:47

Abraham Weintraub comentou o “bug” que fez o perfil oficial do MEC no Twitter informar a abertura dos portões do Enem no horário errado.
“Aparentemente houve um problema na telefonia local, no Brasil ou no mundo, a gente ainda não detectou, o que antecipou alguns relógios e disparou algumas mensagens para algumas pessoas. Mas isso já está sanado, os horários estão mantidos.”
text:
Weintraub: “Apparently there was a problem with local telephony”

Nov 03 2019, 12:47

Abraham Weintraub commented on the "bug" that caused MEC's official Twitter profile to report the opening of Enem's gates at the wrong time.
“Apparently there was a problem with local telephony, in Brazil or in the world, we still haven't detected it, which anticipated some clocks and triggered some messages for some people. But this is already fixed, the schedules are maintained. ”
